workflow_analysis: This workflow demonstrates using variables in target_text fields. The same workflow can search for stars on any GitHub repository by parameterizing the repository name in the search query. This avoids using agent steps for simple text variations.
name: Get GitHub Repository Stars
description: Search for a GitHub repository and extract its star count - works for any repo name

steps.description: Enter repository name to search for
Click on the repository from search results - target_text uses the variable to match the exact repo name

steps.extractionGoal: Extract the number of stars for this repository
steps.description: Get the star count from repository page
